mapper.insert: insert authority(id, name, authority_group_id, uri, status) values (#{id},#{name},#{authorityGroupId},#{uri},#{status})
mapper.select: select * from authority where authority_group_id = #{authGroupId} and name = #{authName};
select * from authority where authority_group_id = #{authGroupId} and uri->>"$.app" = #{app};
select * from authority where authority_group_id = #{authGroupId} and uri->>"$.app" = #{app} and uri->>"$.type" = #{type};
